term.title: iminooxy radicals

item.text: This term has improperly been used for alkylideneaminoxyl radicals, also called iminoxyl radicalsR2C=Nâ€“O.. Its use is strongly discouraged.

sources.item: PAC, 1995, 67, 1307. 'Glossary of class names of organic compounds and reactivity intermediates based on structure (IUPAC Recommendations 1995)' on page 1343 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199567081307)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
